reviewText: Had no idea when I bought the dvd it would be in German and that's a problem since I'm from America, so I rate it 3 stars because of it. But fortunately I could change the audio to English on my ps4 and had to change my region setting to another country which was annoying to do but overall I'm happy with my purchase
these are christmas gift I know he will love it because this is what he wanted

this is a pretty good movie.  this movie is low at first but it's the characters and dialougue and mystery between each character that keeps you going and the performances of each actor is excellent. loved the suspense and the little bit of action at the end. the story is good, the acting is excellent and the suspense and mystery is great. this movie is not as good as django unchained but is probably my third favorite from Quentin the second is death proof. if you have not seen this movie then I recommend you do. I also liked how Quentin taritino broke the fourth wall in the film. it's funny how this movie got so many bad reviews and is a number one seller on amazon
